title: Does this constitutes as boosting?
body: Just recently when one of my friends came over to my house for some games and chill he logged on my pc and let me duo with another friend for a couple of games. We're around the same elo all of us and I believe I played 3 games and got him from plat 5 to 4. Is this considered boosting? If so then I just want to apologize for breaking any rules....

replies.body:
Hey HTM Neru, 

Account sharing is against the [ToS](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse).
Account sharing is against the rules in any context.
ban incoming. shouldnt have admitted it
